channel.title: death on babble
channel.description: Recent content in death on babble

item.title: 017 - More on Play
item.description: If I’m going to make any big leaps with this idea of implementing play in the rest of my life, I’m going to have to do real thinking about it. Like, what does it apply to? how do I incorporate it? does incorporating it in different parts of life look different? what does it mean for my relationships with other people? will it change my demeanor and be weird for those around me?
